entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:39 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
